name: Rhinoceromance
description:
The northern white rhinoceros is critically endangered--only 3 left in the whole world. Based off the fundraising campaign in conjunction with Tinder to revitalize the species, take on the role of Sudan, the last male northern white rhinoceros, and follow him in an adventure of love, adversity, and stat raising. Mostly just stat raising. 

Rhinoceromance was made by team Mistakes Into Miracles for CMPM + ARTG 120. Have fun!
